name: Lilu
description: An open source kernel extension bringing a platform for arbitrary kext, library, and program patching throughout the system for macOS.
changes:
#### v1.3.7
- Allow loading on 10.15 without `-lilubetaall`
- Add support for Xcode 11 analysis tools
- Add workaround to 10.15 SDK Dispatch method (use old Xcode when possible)

suggest.name: AppleALC
suggest.text: Native macOS HD audio for not officially supported codecs.

suggest.name: EnableLidWake
suggest.text: Enable lid wake for Intel Graphics Card.

suggest.name: HibernationFixup
suggest.text: Enable 3 & 25 mode hibernation on certain hardware.

suggest.name: LiluFriend
suggest.text: A helper of Lilu for those who prefer to leave everything inside /Library/Extensions and /System/Library/Extensions.

suggest.name: NightShiftUnlocker
suggest.text: Enables Night Shift on all the models.

suggest.name: NoTouchID
suggest.text: Disables Touch ID checks causing hangs.

suggest.name: VirtualSMC
suggest.text: Advanced Apple SMC emulator in the kernel.
